document_data.name: Dargryg
document_data.mainbody: '''Dagryg''' was an [[ogre]] chieftain in [[Thar]] in [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Dagryg and his small tribe lived in a fort once inhabited by the fabled [[Vorbyx]]. He ordered his tribe to spare all visitors, understanding that bargaining with them granted more riches.
document_data.History: Once Dagryg worked for a [[hill giant]] chieftain who taught him how to spare visitors. In 1373 DR, the [[annis]] [[hag]] [[Gwyaher]], disguised as a [[frost giant]] with her ''[[disguise self]]'' ability, tried to convince Dagryg and his tribe to become her followers.
